about:
I’m a passionate DevOps engineer and software developer with a Bachelor of Software Engineering from Concordia University.
My journey has encompassed a broad range of experiences, from building cloud-native applications and deploying them on Kubernetes to supporting IT infrastructure.
Currently, I’m pursuing certifications in AWS Solutions Architect and Kubernetes (CKAD), which complement my hands-on skills in Docker, CI/CD, and cloud technologies.

My work as an IT Helpdesk Engineer has honed my troubleshooting, scripting, and problem-solving skills, while previous internships allowed me to dive into full-stack development, quality assurance, and big data projects.
I have a strong foundation in Python, JavaScript, and various backend technologies, and I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute technical leadership and innovation.

Whether it’s deploying scalable solutions, enhancing infrastructure, or collaborating on complex projects, I am dedicated to optimizing processes and ensuring efficient, high-quality results.
Check out my projects and GitHub to see what I’ve been working on!
